page.title: 16THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: We go to{Clifton_on_Teme Primary {school.}It is a small school and we have about{60 children}.There are three classrooms and one hall which we use for dinner,assembly P.E and drama. We have three teachers, two ladies and a headmaster who teaches us as well.We have a secretary and two dinner ladies.We start school at nine o clock and usually have an assembly before we start our lessons, which include English, History, Geography,Art and Craft and P.E.In our lessons we sometimes use Calculctors, Computers, Radio ,Television and Video. We have got quite a big playground with netball lines on it.There is a big playing field with goal posts.We have a sphere-shaped climbing frame and a set of bars.We keep ducks at school and we have a school rabbit. {by Michelle Ray & Denise Taylor
